nodes.text: A deity, also called a god (feminine goddess), was a powerful being who was worshipped by a group of followers. Known deities included the Yuuzhan Vong gods and the Keshiri gods, called the Skyborn, as well as the Naboo moon goddess Shiraya.

The Zakuul natives also worshiped a pantheon of gods known as the Old Gods. The so-called Old Ways were generally discarded after the rise of the Eternal Empire. Valkorion, Zakuul's first emperor, claimed to be a god.
